message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $11,500. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  While $9,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This still allows me to make a reasonable profit, and I believe it's a fair price considering the value this product offers. Let's see if we can finalize the deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $10,250. I think this is a fair price for both of us.
